dashboard.about.title: About Nexithra
dashboard.about.p1: Nexithra is a futuristic, AI-powered platform designed to revolutionize how learners of all ages study, revise, and grow. It automates material creation using Google Gemini AI, delivering seamless contextual learning and boosting retention — all through a clean, fast, and responsive UI powered by Next.js.
dashboard.about.features.title: Core Features Include:
dashboard.about.features.notes: AI Content Generation: Generate AI-powered markdown notes with diagrams, instant MCQs with explanations, and dynamic flashcards from any topic.
dashboard.about.features.quizzes: Custom Test Lab: Build custom exams using topic selection or your own notes, set difficulty levels, and add timers.
dashboard.about.features.chatbot: Smart AI Chatbot: Chat with multiple AI personas, including Gojo Satoru and a Coder AI. Features file upload support and even a hidden arcade.
dashboard.about.features.audio: Audio Factory: Convert any text into a summary and listen to it as audio. Generate two-person audio discussions from any topic.
dashboard.about.features.tools: Toolkit & Library: Includes a multi-functional calculator, unit converter, real-time global news terminal, and a library to search YouTube and Google Books.
dashboard.about.features.college: College Portal: Access specialized, exam-focused notes for specific university courses and subjects.
dashboard.about.p2: Built by MrGarvit, Nexithra is more than a project — it's a learning revolution.
dashboard.about.assistantGuide.title: AI Assistant Guide
dashboard.about.assistantGuide.p1: Activate your AI assistant (Jarvis or Alya) using the mic icon in the header. Use the wake words 'Jarvis' or 'Alya' followed by your command.
dashboard.about.assistantGuide.example3: Jarvis, what are my daily quests?
dashboard.about.assistantGuide.example4: Alya, what is the capital of France?
dashboard.terms.title: Terms & Conditions
dashboard.terms.fairUse.title: Fair Use Policy
dashboard.terms.fairUse.desc: Nexithra is provided for personal, educational, and non-commercial use only. The tools are designed to assist and supplement learning. Users are responsible for adhering to the academic integrity policies of their institutions. Do not use this tool for academic dishonesty.
dashboard.terms.accuracy.title: Content Accuracy & AI Usage
dashboard.terms.accuracy.desc: The content generated by our AI, powered by Google's Gemini models, is for informational and study purposes. While we strive for high accuracy, all critical information, data, and solutions should be verified with reliable academic sources. The AI can make mistakes, and Nexithra is not liable for any inaccuracies in the generated content.
dashboard.terms.license.title: License & Attribution
dashboard.terms.license.desc: This project is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License. You are free to share and adapt the project for non-commercial purposes, provided you give appropriate credit. The UI components are provided by ShadCN, and icons are from Lucide React.
